name: undimmed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
staying strong without becoming less: Her energy seems undimmed after all these years. The crisis in farming has made the past few years difficult, but their enthusiasm is undimmed.
More examplesFewer examplesEngland have not played well in Germany, which they acknowledge, although their determination is undimmed.His love for life was undimmed to the last.Their political appeal remains relatively undimmed.His passion remained undimmed, and painting was the one subject that animated him during his last illness.
